meta.title: ~/emilynguyen
meta.description: Emily Nguyen - Software Engineer, Game Dev, Educator

profile.name: Emily Nguyen
profile.bio: UC Berkeley CS grad with 5+ years building robust frameworks and tooling. Currently at Meta working on CI/CD infrastructure for Reality Labs wearables. I love making tools that help developers ship faster.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
experience.description: Lead engineer on test and release infrastructure for Reality Labs wearable prototypes. Building CI/CD enabled E2E testing and prototype device test lab.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
experience.description: Released the Dolby Atmos Plugin for Unreal Engine with a team of 12, collaborating with Epic Games. Built Python interfaces for complex applications and optimized CI/CD pipelines by 33%.

experience.title: Code Coach
experience.description: Taught programming to students ages 7-16 in personalized sessions. Led nine week-long camps with 12-14 students each.

experience.title: Software Developer
experience.description: Built a QuickPay payment system with Stripe API. Designed UI/UX and developed frontend with Django.

projects.name: Dolby Atmos for Unreal
projects.description: Cross-platform real-time audio processing SDK plugin for Unreal Engine, released in collaboration with Epic Games.

projects.name: Crowd Simulation
projects.description: Unity simulation of a busy intersection with traffic lights, pedestrians, and crosswalks using NavMesh AI.

projects.name: VR Escape Room
projects.description: Interactive VR escape room with minigames, built for Oculus.

projects.name: ArkAngel
projects.description: 2D top-down adventure RPG with dialogue branching, player movement, and minigames.
